title: Business Strategy in the Pacific Rim
description: This course provides a case-based approach to developing and implementing strategy. It uses business cases from Asia (China, Japan, Taiwan, and South Korea) and Latin America (Mexico, Brazil, Chile, and Argentina) to help students develop a well-defined methodology for approaching strategic decision making that would be applicable to any situation. Renumbered from IRGN 426. Students may not receive credit for GPIM 426 and IRGN 426.
